attributes.action: To reduce the number of MP's sitting in the House of Commons by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: remove at least 50% of mp's from the house of commons thereby making it more efficient and easier to monitor their exspenses and allowances.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
